required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of LY3463251 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Subject- and Investigator-Blind, Single and Multiple Dose, Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics Study of LY3463251 in Healthy and Overweight Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability (side effects) of single (Part A) and multiple (Part B) doses of the study drug when it is administered subcutaneously (under the skin) into the abdomen.
This is a two-part study. Participants will enroll in only one part. For each participant, Part A will last about 10 weeks and Part B will last about 23 weeks, including screening.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with One or More Serious Adverse Event(s) (SAEs) Considered by the Investigator to be Related to Study Drug Administration
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through follow up in Part A (up to Day 42); Baseline through follow up in Part B (up to Day 123)
primary_outcome.description: A summary of SAEs and other non-serious adverse events (AEs), regardless of causality, will be reported in the Reported Adverse Events module

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Maximum Observed Drug Concentration (Cmax) of LY3463251
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Day 29 (Part A); Baseline to Day 107 (Part B)

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of LY3463251
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to Day 29 (Part A); Baseline to Day 107(Part B)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Body Weight
secondary_outcome.description: Change from Baseline in Body Weight

arm_group.description: Single dose of LY3463251 administered subcutaneously (SC)
Single dose of placebo administered SC
Multiple doses of LY3463251 administered SC
Multiple doses of placebo administered SC

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy males and females
Exclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes
- Women who are of childbearing potential or who are breastfeeding
- Donated blood of more than 500 millilitres (mL) within the previous 3 months of study screening
- Have used any tobacco product within 3 months of Day -1, or are unwilling to refrain from the use of tobacco during the study
